Title: Long live the great unity of all the peoples of the whole nation
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: Representatives of the different 'National Minorities' of China take part in a 1 October parade on Tiananmen Square in Beijing.The poster was first published in 1964. This version is from the seventh edition, totalling 1,500,000 copies.
Theme: 1 October, National Day of the People's Republic of ChinaNational Minorities
